definition: Crayon Shin-chan (クレヨンしんちゃん), Japanese manga and anime series popular in China
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: Body of Usui Yoshito, father of Crayon Shinchan, found.
sentences.chinese: 日警方发现《蜡笔小新》作者臼井仪人遗体。

sentences.english: Crayon Shin-chan, I envy you your innocence.
sentences.chinese: 蜡笔小新，我羡慕你的纯真。

sentences.english: Where has Shenzhen to sell new small wax crayon fine hair or the charpie toy?
sentences.chinese: 深圳哪里有卖蜡笔小新绒毛或绒布玩具的？

definition: cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
Garfield (comic strip cat created by Jim Davis)
Tuzki, a popular Chinese illustrated rabbit character
Winnie-the-Pooh (bear character in children's stories by A. A. Milne adapted by Disney)
Dragon Ball, Japanese manga and anime series
